name: network-toolkit
title: Network Toolkit
description: A powerful toolkit for network analysis, diagnostics, and troubleshooting, designed for IT professionals and enthusiasts.
author: skyefugate

commands.name: pingy
commands.title: Pingy
commands.subtitle: Network Diagnostics
commands.description: Diagnostics on whatever you bring to the table. :)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
